item13.techList: React / CSS / ES6 / openweathermap API / ipgeolocation API
item13.descrText: When you visit the page 'ipgeolocation API' gets the name of your city and sends request to the openweathermap API. In response, we get the weather forecast for 5 days, 3 measurements per day. It is also possible to specify a specific city where the weather interests you.

item12.techList: React / CSS / ES6 / firebaseAPI / githubLogin / facebookLogin
item12.descrText: React app which uses firebaseAPI to get data about sea food dishes. Yhe first page is generate store name and creates menu page. In menu page you can find three sections: menu list, order calculator, login menu. After GitHub/Facebook login you can download dishes list an make some order.

item11.descrText: React app which uses Real API to get up to date financial data about crypto currencies. Maded for mastering the React fundamentals such as JSX, "props", "state", eventing, "routing", fetching data, working with Forms.

item4.descrText: This work is the result of studying the material on AJAX. The application sends a request to the API on a third-party resource (the resource is temporarily not working), reads the response and shows it to the user. You can share it on Twitter.

item5.descrText: Bombs appear in the top of screen and fall down. As soon as the bomb touches the bottom of the screen, 1 unit of health will be taken away. Bombs can be defused by clicking on them (mouse / finger). The essence of the game is to defuse the biggest number of bombs.

item6.techList: HTML 5/ SASS / Flexbox Smart Grid / JQuery / gulp
item6.descrText: The main page is landing with descriptions of services. Also in other pages there is a blog with filtering by categories, calendar, and a page for buying certificates. In a calendar user can see the date of the jumps. Also implemented the interactive map with the choice of the aerodrome.

item8.techList: HTML 5 / css3 / Bootstrap4 grid / fotorama slider
item8.descrText: On this site it was necessary to add a section of galleries and add a slider accordingly. Also, the correction bugs in forms and buttons.

item3.techList: HTML 5 / CSS / PHP / MySQL / JQuery / cms Joomla / Bootstrap 3
item3.descrText: Product catalog furniture company based on Joomla (responsive design, product gallery, map, chat for contact with the seller). Full development cycle from scratch.

item2.descrText: An example of the layout of the main page of the news portal. Pure layout + adaptive layout.

item1.descrText: An example of the layout of the blog, based on WordPress.

item7.techList: HTML 5 / SASS / Bootstrap4 grid / popup / BX slider / JQuery / gulp
item7.descrText: Adaptive, cross-browser layout. Home with service descriptions, news blog, language change exit/entry forms, 'accordions' with frequently asked questions and contacts.

item9.techList: HTML 5 / css3 / smart grid / webpack / JQuery
item9.descrText: The site has a blog, application form for departments, 'accordion' with frequently asked questions, search for contacts of employees, archive of documents for download.

item10.descrText: Website layout for a company offering surrogate motherhood services. The site contains a selection form of donor programs, a page with a choice of 'photo sketch' and physical data of the donor, a blog, an accordion with answers to questions. And much more...
